title: When California Snatched My Paycheck
sub_head: A cautionary tale for Biden’s plan to let the IRS snoop via banks.
body:
Many Americans are upset about a recent proposal by the Biden administration to let the Internal Revenue Service look at anyone’s bank accounts that have more than $600 deposited.
They may not know that in California the state government is already being granted access to view the funds in people’s personal checking accounts if they have even the slightest reason to believe someone is a tax dodger. Here’s what happened to me:
